titleStmt.title: The Catholicks defence for their adoration of the body and blood of our Lord as believed really and substantially present in the Holy Sacrament of the Eucharist.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Abraham Woodhead, who is in actuality R.H. cf. NUC pre-1956.
